doc.title: Para bailar se necesitan dos
doc.plot: Mañe and Mary are two Latin American immigrants who live in Barcelona. They are a dancing couple and they dance "Salsa" around the city to make a living. Mañe and Mary have a secret sentimental relationship as well and they can be openly together only while they are dancing. Mary is about to reveal some news to Mañe that will challenge their relationship and by the end of the day they will know it always takes two to Salsa.
